books.Title: Bukhari
books.Description: Bukhari is the most authentic book after Quran e pak.
books.author: Ismael Bukhari

books.Description: Muslim is also the most authentic book after Quran e pak.
books.author: Muslin bin Hijaj AlQusheeri
